alert.note: Alert for Apple and Lucerne Valleys; San Bernardino County Mountains (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued February 03 at 8:20PM PST until February 05 at 10:00PM PST by NWS SanDiego
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM TO 10 PM PST SUNDAY... * WHAT...West winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...San Bernardino County Mountains and Apple and Lucerne Valleys. * WHEN...From 10 AM to 10 PM PST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Winds will be strongest on the desert slopes of the mountains.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Apple and Lucerne Valleys; San Bernardino County Mountains
